Does this also include xemacs support? In that case our team ia very much
interested.

-----Original Message-----
From: Simon A. Crase [mailto:simon@...]
Sent: vrijdag 08 juni 2001 03:11
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Anyon else interested in Emacs support for junit


I have written a simple emacs extension to create a test case class, add
tests, and insert assertEquals/assertTrue.  If anyone else is interested,
I'll write some doco and make the code available.  If not, I'll just do
enough doco for my own team.


Cheers,


Simon
